entry.title: Top 25 Albums of 2015
entry.content:
Here are my top 25 albums of 2015, following up from my list of top 100 songs of the year.

Here’s to a great 2015.

Disappointments:
Purity Ring - another eternity
Shamir - Ratchet
Hot Chip - Why Make Sense?
Titus Andronicus - The Most Lamentable Tragedy
The Weeknd - Beauty Behind The Madness

Honorable Mentions:
The Waterfall - My Morning Jacket
Future - DS2
Kacey Musgraves - Pageant Material
Miguel - Wildheart
Bully - Feels Like

And that last list:

25. DJ Koze - DJ-Kicks
24. Natalie Prass - S/T
23. Panda Bear - Panda Bear Meets the Grim Reaper
22. Torres - Sprinter
21. Waxahatchee - Ivy Tripp
20. Donnie Trumpet & The Social Experiment - Surf
19. If You're Reading This It's Too Late - Drake
18. Hop Along - Painted Shut
17. Mount Eerie - Sauna
16. Neon Indian - Vega Intl. Night School
15. Earl Sweatshirt - I Don't Like Shit, I Don't Go Outside
14. Vince Staples - Summertime '06'
13. Deerhunter - Fading Frontier
12. Jamie xx - In Colour
11. Sleater-Kinney - No Cities to Love

10. Viet Cong - S/T
9. Courtney Barnett - Sometimes I Sit and Think, And Sometimes I Just Sit
8. Girl Band - Holding Hands with Jamie
7. Tame Impala - Currents
6. Destroyer - Poison Season
5. Nicolas Jaar - Nymphs I-IV
4. Father John Misty - I Love You, Honeybear
3. Sufjan Stevens - Carrie & Lowell
2. Art Angels - Grimes
1. Kendrick Lamar - To Pimp a Butterfly

Happy 2016,

  • GPS

entry.title: Top 100 Songs of 2015
entry.content:
Rules: Song must be on a release this year, no more than 2 songs per artist. Also, if the track was used in last year’s list, it cannot make this year’s (IE: on an EP, now on a LP). Spotify playlist below. Let’s do this.

Happy 2016,

  • GPS

entry.title: Top 25 Albums of 2014
entry.content:
Here are my top 25 albums of 2014, following up from my list of top 100 songs of the year.

Here’s to a great 2015. And expect Logesh’s list of top films of the year to come out soon.

Disappointments:
Tune-Yards - nikki nack
Jack White - Lazaretto
Foxygen - ...And Star Power
alt-j - All This Is Yours
Black Lips - Underneath the Rainbow

Honorable Mentions:
Angel Olsen - Burn Your Fire for No Witness
Owen Pallett - In Conflict
Ex Hex - Rips
The New Pornographers - Brill Bruisers
The Antlers - Familiars

And that last list:

25. Strand of Oaks - HEAL
24. Vince Staples - Hell Can Wait
23. Piñata - Freddie Gibbs & Madlib
22. FKA Twigs - LP1
21. Wye Oak - Shriek
20. Wild Beasts - Present Tense
19. Cloud Nothings - Here and Nowhere Else
18. Sun Kil Moon - Benji
17. Swans - To Be Kind
16. How To Dress Well - "What Is This Heart?"
15. Real Estate - Atlas
14. Shabazz Palaces - Lese Majesty
13. Aphex Twin - Syro
12. Sharon Van Etten - Are We There
11. Future Islands - Singles

10. Mr Twin Sister - Mr Twin Sister
9. Hundred Waters - The Moon Rang Like a Bell
8. Caribou - Our Love
7. The War on Drugs - Lost in The Dream
6. Flying Lotus - You're Dead!
5. Spoon - They Want My Soul
4. Mac Demarco - Salad Days
3. St. Vincent - St. Vincent
2. Run the Jewels - Run the Jewels 2
1. Todd Terje - It's Album Time

Happy 2015,

  • GPS
